text:
Is it possible to make blogs visible based on language?

For example, I want only French blogs to show when /fr/ is in the URL, English to show when /en/ is in the URL. But I cannot see any way in which you can do this?
Hi guys is there a setting to turn off auto close of divs? Thank you
how to restore deleted template folder

Just wanted to thank the HS dev who made the advanced menus menu builder more keyboard accessible. You’re a hero. :slightly_smiling_face: (I have fine vision and whatnot but I prefer using the keyboard when I can when filling in forms) idk if you can re-arrange items with keyboard or anything fancy like that but for just filling it in it’s faster now.
side note - modals with only 2 buttons(close and confirm) still do not accept hitting enter to confirm, would be nice
Hello, is it possible to make a member area in HubSpot?

Hey, does anyone know what happened to the planned feature for translations / variations of blogs got too? specifically the idea mentioned here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Multi-language-Blog/idi-p/10903/page/5#comments> can’t seem to find any docs or updates

found a bug when transfering global group via a template to a new portal, modules copied over but the modules are unlinked in the global group now
<https://spin.d.pr/IutYhK+>
clicking restore component also doesn’t work
I am still having issues with `{{ resize_image_url() }}`. There are a couple of images that are not getting resized with this function… Been this way for one month

not sure of the correct channel, and hoping that this was an anomaly, but a client sent an email to a list and all of the unsubscribe links included ```"Note that this is a test. The above email address will not have its preferences updated"``` in the associated pages.  the url for the unsubscribe links appeared as if it thought it was a test email as it had "test" in the url.  needless to say, client received some feedback.  have reached out to support but part of the answer is ```I can't seem to find how you were able to do a bulk send within a Test environment```
Yikes, that’s definitely not supposed to happen
Can you share the portal ID so I can follow up on the ticket and make sure it gets escalated correctly?
Yep. Am away from computer right now. Will follow up in a bit and thanks!
